text: Rangali is an island in Alif Dhaal Atoll, Maldives. It is the setting for the Conrad Maldives Rangali Island resort, which has twice been voted the best hotel in the world. It is known for its underwater restaurant Ithaa.Mr. Simplicity.(2007_04). "Underwater Restaurant" . Fun Distraction. Retrieved on 2012-04-02.And also very known for the First underwater Villa called The Muraka. It has a bedroom and bathroom under sea level. this villa costs as much as 50.000 USD Per night. ==References== Category:Islands of the Maldives Category:Resorts in the Maldives
title: Rangali
